alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 9:49PM CDT until May 31 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Butler County in south central Kansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 948 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rose Hill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, El Dorado, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Douglass, Sedgwick, Towanda, Colwich and Benton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 22. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 34 and 78. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
